description: Meshaal, who lives in exile in Qatar, said the Palestinian spirit rises again, despite the losses suffered amid Israel's year-long war on the territory.
title: Hamas will rise 'like a phoenix' from the ashes, Meshaal says

description: The US spent billions on military financing, arms sales, and on drawdowns from US stockpiles and hand-me-downs of used equipment in support of Israel.
title: US spent $17.9bn on military aid to Israel since last October 7

description: Human Rights Watch warned on Monday that Israeli strikes near the Lebanon-Syria border crossing are endangering civilians and obstructing humanitarian efforts.
title: HRW: Israeli strikes endanger civilians on Lebanon-Syria border

description: Lebanon's caretaker minister has voiced concern over Israel's aerial military assaults causing harm to the country's heritage sites in Baalbek.
title: Israeli strikes on Lebanon endanger ancient sites, says minister

description: The opposition is pushing for Lebanon to reassert state control over decisions of war and peace, and for all weapons to be exclusively in the hands of the state
title: Lebanese opposition MPs call for immediate ceasefire with Israel

description: Artists, ordinary people and officials lash out at Israeli attacks and voice their support for Lebanese people but analysts say Cairo has limited influence
title: In Egypt, an outpouring of solidarity with Lebanon

description: Analysis: The normalisation camp's expansion was once seen as inevitable by some, but Israel's brutal war on Gaza has changed the equation.
title: What did one year of war in Gaza do to the Abraham Accords?

description: Hamas has released a statement on the first anniversary of its October 7 attack on Israel, defending its actions as a “natural response” to Israel’s policies.
title: Hamas marks one year anniversary of 7 October attack

description: Israeli forces beat a 66-year-old prominent Palestinian man to death during a raid on his home in the occupied West Bank.
title: Israeli forces kill elderly Palestinian activist in brutal raid

description: A year on from 7 October, Sari Hanafi reflects on Israel's destruction, repression of solidarity in Western countries, & whether there's hope for Palestine.
title: 7 October: Can we pull hope from under Gaza's rubble a year on?

description: Lebanese officials on Monday say an Israeli strike has killed at least 10 firefighters in the country's south after one year since the war on Gaza began.
title: Israeli strike kills 10 firefighters in south Lebanon: official

description: For a whole year, Hezbollah has tied ending rocket fire on Israel to a ceasefire in Gaza, but that stance might be about to change.
title: Hezbollah MP hints ready for Lebanon deal without Gaza truce

description: Vigils, commemorations and acts of remembrance were planned worldwide to mark one year since the 7 October Hamas attack on Israel and the start of the Gaza war.
title: How the world marked 7 October attack and start of war on Gaza

description: A powerful image of Inas Abu Maamar cradling her deceased five-year-old niece, Saly, has become a symbol of Palestinian suffering during Israel's Gaza assault.
title: A picture of her grief gripped the world. A year on, Gaza woman haunted by memories

description: Huda Skaik explains that even after Israel ceases its assault on Gaza, it will be a daily battle for survival. The war doesn't simply end when violence stops.
title: Gaza 1 year: An end to Israel’s war won't bring peace

description: Israel began its commemorations marking the one-year anniversary of the attack, set against the backdrop of widespread destruction and significant loss of life.
title: Israel marks 7 October anniversary under shadow of war on Gaza

description: The Israeli military is planning to expand its operations to the north, attempting to invade south Lebanon amid heavy clashes with Hezbollah
title: Israel sends third army division to Lebanon as soldiers killed

description: Journalist Samuel Mena Jr self-immolated after expressing remorse over his role in news stories that he felt made him complicit in the war on Gaza.
title: Journalist self-immolates outside White House to Gaza coverage

description: International human rights groups are urging for a ceasefire and accountability on the anniversary of Israel's war on Gaza.
title: Rights groups slam failure to end Gaza war one year on

description: Analysis: In Gaza's post-genocide landscape, Israel seeks to replicate a West Bank governance model that will entrench an apparatus of total control.
title: A year of war in Gaza: Israel redesigns an endless occupation

description: The deputy commander of Iran's Quds Force, Iraj Masjedi, has stated that Force Commander Email Qaani is in good health, according to reports from state media.
title: Iran Quds Force's Qaani 'in good health' following death claims

description: The New Arab spoke to members of Israel's Palestinian and Jewish communities on how they have navigated life since 7 October.
title: Palestinians and Jewish Israelis struggle for hope on 7 October

description: Maghzaoui, once a close ally of Saied, urged security forces to "protect the electoral process" after what he called erroneous early figures.
title: Tunisia's Saied set for landslide win, opponents reject poll

description: "I did not expect that we would commemorate the first anniversary of the war while we were still displaced," Al-Hamami told The New Arab.
title: Year on Israel's war, Gaza's displaced wait and dream of return

description: One year on, The New Arab examines how the Israeli military’s assault has targeted the Palestinian female womb and its devastating impact on women's lives
title: Inside Israel's year-long assault on Gaza's reproductive power

description: The United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees (UNRWA) recently noted that at least ten children lose a limb every day in Gaza.
title: Gaza's children amputees struggle to live amid Israel's war

description: Israel's 12-month war on Gaza has left Palestinians relying on humanitarian aid to survive, as the country battles a 'full-blown economic catastrophe'
title: Israel's war on Gaza's economy a year on: Killing by other means

description: From boycotts to protests, to fashion and art shows and student encampments, we take a look at how the world showed up for Palestine over the past 12 months
title: How Palestine became the world's defining cause after 7 October

description: Israeli forces continue to bombard the Lebanese capital, while simultaneously launching strikes across Gaza, marking the anniversary of the October 7 attacks.
title: Israel kills 10 firefighters in Lebanon on October 7 anniversary

description: Israel's twelve-month war on Gaza has seen unprecedented attacks on the health system; hospitals sieged, ambulances attacked and doctors arrested.
title: One year on: Israel's lethal siege on Gaza's health system

description: While led by the Palestinian diaspora, the pro-Palestinian demonstrations are seeing support from across different communities.
title: Weekend protests across US mark a year of Israel's war on Gaza

description: Israeli forces continue to bombard the Lebanese capital, while simultaneously launching strikes across Gaza, marking the anniversary of the October 7 attacks.
title: Israel bombs Gaza and Lebanon on 7 October anniversary
